title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - Bern, Switzerland
description:
very happy to announce the next level of the legendary global day of code retreat in bern. we invite coders from all over the world to have a day of fun. 
 event starts @ 10am and ends up 8 hours later…. for food and drinks dvbern ag (http://www.dvbern.ch/) is taking care, so bring yourself, your laptop and your free mind! 
 we are looking forward to meeting you soon, don’t hesitate and register (https://willcome.to/yAAQrF)!
